duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide prompt, ethical, courteous and technical response to customer calls/emails/texts
Resolve routine and complex mechanical, process, service, and logistical issues
Review and understand technical specifications, plan drawings & internal equipment details
Accountable for ensuring service orders are entered into the ERP system and CRM databases
Enter customer issues or inquiries into the customer service issue log system
Coordinate RGAs and in-house service repairs
Coordinate field services, field and in-house training (customers), and field service calendar
Work with multiple internal and external entities and maintain thorough documentation

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing or a related field
